name: One Dimensional Arcade
description:
MOUSE ONLY - You only need a mouse to play this game, just click and stuff will happen!

Welcome to the One Dimensional Arcade! We've got all 3 of your favorite games, with only half the dimensions! Tetris, Frogger, Breakout, what more could you ask for!

This was created in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam with the theme being "Dimension Change"
